documents.document:
Hotels in Munnar Where Abundant Pleasant Nature Awaits For Y

Munnar in Kerala is the picturesque destination and the most sought after tourist destination. Munnar is a beautiful hill town which is beautifully nestled in the verdant Western Ghats. This hill town is located at elevation of 1600 meter above the main sea level and thus favors this hill station with soothing cool climatic conditions. The hill town is beautifully surrounded by the amazing green dense forest and green sprawling hills which easily entice the visitors from all over the globe.

Beautiful Munnar easily entice every sort of visitors from all over the globe for wonderful vacation. Truly speaking this beautiful hill town is dotted with stunning attractions and picturesque landscapes which easily attracts visitors and the honeymooners from all over the globe. This picturesque hill town is very famous for its beautiful hotels and resorts which offer the tourist wonderful and a delightful vacation.

Beautiful hotels in Munnar are situated just beside the green scintillating surroundings which offer you the best stay. Luxurious and spacious room with all the indoor facilities such TV, VCD, Video Games and others and clean for 24 hours easily offer the tourist the feel of home far away from home. The warm hospitability in this cool atmosphere truly will make you fall in love with it; the lip smacking cuisines offered in the hotels are as per your choice and truly astounding. The privacy is well maintained in the beautiful hotels and the resorts. The beautiful hotels truly offer you very amazing holiday and the stay in the hotels is superb blend of the luxury and comfort at its best.

Apart from the Munnar hotels there are wide range of attractions which easily lure the visitors and truly this scenic place offer everyone the most remarkable holiday. The green lush valleys filled with mist, vast expanse of lush green tea gardens, musical waterfalls, picturesque lakes, aromatic spice and coffee plantations, astounding landscapes and the exotic wildlife are some attractions which offer the visitors a wonderful vacation in the mother lap of nature.

So, contact a leading Kerala tour operator and customize a package and book hotels for your heavenly stay and enjoy a peaceful, romantic vacation in the Mother Lap of Nature.

Find more information for Budget Hotels in Munnar at http://www.munnarhotels.org.in.

Outstanding Hotels of Cochin Offers Wonderful Stay in Kerala

Kerala is a wonderful state in India which is located in the South of this country. This beautiful state is truly very worth to visit and explore in this country. Hovering between the gorgeous Arabian Sea and the mighty Western Ghats this state offers every thing to every sort of visitors. This beautiful state is visited by all the type of vacationers, visitors, family, group, honeymooners and globe trotters from all over the globe. Visitors easily get lost in the exotic charm and the magnitude beauty of this state in India. Beautiful Kerala is dotted with wide varieties of tourist attractions and fabulous destinations which truly are very worth to visit and explore. This beautiful state as the visitors are so curious about their comfort stay thus offer super blended numerous budget hotels and resorts which is speckled all over the place and is easily accessible.

Among the beautiful destinations in this state Cochin is one of the astounding destinations which are very worth to visit and explore. Beautiful Cochin is the earlier capital state of Kerala and is truly very worth to visit for your fanciful vacation. Today this city is the most commercial and financial city in this state and is become an international hub for the visitors and the business personnel from all over the globe. Hotels in Cochin truly in Kerala are the best to explore and truly offer any visitors a delightful stay along with the superb accommodations. The lip smacking Indian cuisines and the wonderful hospitability will tempt you to visit this state again and again.

The beautiful hotels truly offer every thing to the visitors as so they do not have to go out from the hotels for anything everything is offered here in the hotels to the visitors. The facilities like the ISD and STD phones, spacious halls for meetings or get together, Gym room, Spa centre, green emerald gardens, swimming pool, indoor game amenities like snooker, lounge tennis, badminton, squash and many alike elate the visitors heart as with their stay in the Cochin hotels.

Any visitors just come in a vacation to stay and enjoy in the beautiful hotels and resorts but the breathtakingly beautiful attractions easily lure all the visitors and tourist all over the year. Beautiful Cochin is lovingly called as gateway to Kerala and is also identified as the ‘Queen of the Arabian Sea’. This beautiful place is situated in the South Western Coast of Indian Subcontinent. This beautiful city is truly paradise for the visitors and truly is dotted with magnificent attractions which truly enhance the beauty and importance of Cochin tourism. Some of the major tourists attractions which truly are sheer wonders and which will overcast magical spell on your visit are such as Chinese Fishing Nets, Fort Kochi, Fort Kochi beach, Vasco House, Fort Kochi, Dutch Palace (Mattancherry Palace), Mattancherry, Bolghatty Palace, Bolghatty Island, etc.

The beautiful attractions and the magnificent sightseeing spots all the day and amazing relaxation in the Cochin hotels will truly offer you the best vacation ever.

Find more information for Hotels in Cochin at http://www.cochinhotels.org.in.

Hotels in Cochin Offers Wonderful and Delightful Stay

Kerala is the most beautiful states in India. Dotted with numerous tourist attractions and destinations this state is truly one of the most fascinating states to visit in this state. Kerala which beautifully hovers between the gorgeous Arabian Sea and the mighty Western Ghats, easily entice the tourist from all over the globe. Numerous tourist destination and the attractions in this country easily attracts visitors for their delightful and wonderful holiday.

As every beautiful destination is dotted with amazing tourist attractions and astounding hotels which offer wonderful stay, so are Kerala and its wonderful destinations. Hotels in Kerala easily attract visitors from all over the globe for a wonderful stay and delightful staying.

Visitors from all over the globe as they visit to Kerala they never miss the opportunity to visit the wonderful city of Cochin. Cochin lovingly called as ‘Queen of Arabian Sea’ situated on the South Western Coast Subcontinent. This city is also called as the gateway to Kerala; the city is bordered by the Arabian Sea in the West and Western Ghats in the East. This city is situated in the Ernakulam district of Kerala. This city is truly one of the best tourist attractions which easily attracts tourist from all over the globe. Hotels in Cochin are of different categories five star deluxe and the budget hotels which easily suit all the categories of visitors.

The different hotels in this city truly offer the tourist the privacy, safe and happy stay, luxury and comfort at its best and the delicacies along with the warm hospitability will easily entice the tourist in different Cochin hotels. The hotels truly offer beautiful halls for the business purpose and where the meetings are held. Hotels also offer the visitor’s different sightseeing tours which are enjoyed by the tourist and thus keep them engaged on their vacation.

This city is dotted with amazing attractions which truly are very worth to visit and explore some of them are listed below:

Chinese fishing Nets
Lovingly this fishing net is known as Cheenavala and is unique feature in the city. This is enormous nets used by the local fishermen to catch fish. The unique thing of this net is that other than Cochin this fishing nets are found only in China.

Willingdon Island
This is a man made island created in 1933 which earlier once served as an airport, sea port and Railway terminus. It is only situated 30 km away from the city of Cochin and is now home to Cochin Port and the headquarters of Southern Naval Command.

Fort Kochi Beach
This is bliss for the visitors as this beach is a wonderful experience during the sunsets with silhouettes of Chinese Fishing Nets. Lip smacking fresh seafood is available at the stalls near the beach are wonderful. The beach is beautifully endowed by the sea facing resorts, hotels and the Cheap hotels in Cochin are truly astounding and worth to visit and explore.

So, contact a leading tour operator and book a package to Cochin and enjoy your delightful vacation and wonderful stay with the Cochin hotels.

Find more information for Hotels in Cochin at http://www.cochinhotels.org.in.

Explore and experience breathtaking nature with Munnar Hotel

World-renowned ‘God’s Own Country’, Kerala is an ancient and blissful state of India located at south-western part of India tempts nature-lovers, holiday seekers and honeymoon couples from across the world throughout out the year. Mother-nature has blessed this state with such attractions whose significance is beyond the words and visual descriptions. If you love nature and wish to explore copious elements of nature, then there wouldn’t be any better option than Kerala often summarized as green paradise. People who wish to spend their vacations in the lap of Mother-Nature visit this state in the hordes throughout the year.

Some of the best attractions of nature that one can found in this state are refreshing hill stations mostly set amidst western-Ghats, palm-fringed beaches, exclusive scenic backwaters and exotic wildlife national sanctuaries. Its mesmerizing attractions and heavenly ambiance persuade tourists to visit this place from across the world all the year round. The land of spices or Ayurveda, Kerala has been awarded with so many prizes and also crowned as one of the ten paradises in the world by National Geographic traveler magazine.

Apart from, it is equally famous its exotic south-Indian food, rich tradition, hospitable people and exclusive hotels which serves all the amenities to the visitors and treat them as like god. Very strange but true that being a tropical state, Kerala is gifted with copious refreshing hill stations which are worth to explore while visiting this state. Among numerous hill stations, Munnar is one of the finest one located at the western-Ghats famous for its breathtaking attractions that can be well explored by hiring and staying Munnar hotels.

Due to its magnetizing beauty or soothing climatic conditions it is lovingly called Kashmir of south. Picturesque landscapes, lush green meadows, sprawling tea-gardens, exotic wildlife parks and diverse ranges of floras and faunas make Munnar one of the finest place in the planet. This stunning hillock was once the summer gateway of Britishers and there are many colonial bungalows built by them and where most of the travelers prefer to stay while visiting there. Its heart-gripping attractions and pleasant climatic conditions take tourists very close to nature. Be here and fill your lungs with cool and aromatic air while admiring scenic landscape.

There are numerous Hotels in Munnar which gives all the comforts and luxuries to the vacationers, during visiting this place you will find there copious hotels in reasonable coast. Due to huge influx of tourists in this place, Kerala tourism has set there so many hotels and resorts providing you best holidaying experience so that you make Munnar as your favourite holidaying destination. Some of the best attraction places that one can explore while visiting there are listed below.

Pothanmedu

It is one of the most scenic spot offering the majestic views of the tea, coffee and cardamom plantations and also an ideal place for trekking, mountaineering and etc.

Eravikulam National Park

Eravikulam National Park is one of the must see places in Munnar home of the Nilgiri Tahr and the Anamudi Peak. There are many other attraction places around Munnar named as Attukal Waterfalls, Poopara, Devikulam and many more. There are several budget hotels in Munnar shelters of comfort and wonderful accommodations for the travelers.

Find more information for Budget Hotels in Munnar at http://www.munnarhotels.org.in.

Hotels in Cochin Offer Excellent Services and Wonderful Stay

Munnar, Trivandrum, Kovalam, Qullion, Kumarakom, Alleppey and there are numerous sheer wonders which easily attracts visitors throughout the year. Cochin is another enthralling city which is located towards the southern tip of the Indian peninsula and on the edge of the Arabian Sea is the most sought after tourist destination. This beautiful city is truly the most fascinating cities in the state of Kerala and is bliss for the visitors from all over the globe.

Dotted with beautiful luxury and budget hotels in Cochin this city is truly become the favorites for all the sort of tourist. Cochin is one of the prominent cities in this state which attracts visitors of every type. Truly the different types of hotels in this city truly offer world class facilities and amenities, warm hospitality and lip smacking cuisines which truly leads to a wonderful stay. The beautiful hotels and the surroundings easily attract the honeymooners for a wonderful holiday.

Cochin lovingly called as an ideal gateway for Kerala and was the earlier capital of the state. Today this city is the busiest and the commercial place in Kerala which invites visitors along with many business personals, who visits this city for business meetings and purposes. Cochin hotels offer the business personals beautiful and luxurious halls where meetings and conference is held. The hotels also offer many beautiful sightseeing tour options for the tourist who is staying in the hotels.

The hotels also offer services like internet services, phone services, gym room, swimming pools, indoor game facilities, restaurants, bars and pubs which offer wonderful holiday vacations. The hotels also arrange parties for the visitors during the New Year eve, Christmas and many other festivals and on other cherish occasions which truly offer wonderful cuisines and many other facilities which lure visitor’s very lot.

Some of the major attractions which are visited in this country are such as Fort Kochi, Museum of Kerala History, Willingdon Island, St Francis Church, Jewish Synagogue, Marine Drive, Chiniese Fishing Nets and many alike truly entice and tempt the visitors to visit this city again and again.

Cochin is thus one of the most sought after tourist destinations to visit and explore with any Kerala tour package. Thus it is advisable to contact any leading Kerala tour operators and customize a package to Cochin and book your type of hotels in Cochin, which suits you and fits to your pocket and explore the beauty of Cochin and enjoy your most wonderful and delightful vacations.

Experience the Heaven of Peace and Tranquility of the Green

Munnar is one of the most popular tourist destinations of Kerala. It is located on the Western Ghats at the confluence the three mountain streams in Idukki district. The place is one of the most popular hill resorts in tourism and the best site to escape for enjoyments and relaxations. The place is famous for its tea plantations and other crops like spice and coffee decorates the landscapes dramatically captures millions of attentions and thus the site is now one of the best site sought out green paradise on earth.

It is the best places found in India for experiencing the real beauty of nature. The picturesque site possess many other attracts which is reserve for the travelers to relish the breathtaking ecstasy of the heavenly ambience of nature. Here are some of the worth visiting sites in which you can rely on for your desire purpose and fulfilled your dream of floating in the heavenly romance of the green paradise on earth. If you are planning for it book the budget hotels in Munnar which are quite cheap and available with excellent accommodations.

The listed out top attractions of Munnar are as follows:

Pothamedu
It is the best spot where you can have the majestic glimpse of the breathtaking wonders of the lush exotic field of tea, coffee and cardamom plantations. You will most of the tourist involve themselves in trekking and mountain walk to feel the scenic beauty and excitements of nature.

Devikulam
It is one of the most fan tourist destinations in Munnar beautifully decorated with the exotic nature of flora and fauna. Here the Sita Devi Lake is the one of the most charming ambience is an excellent spot for picnics and leisure spending. The lake is well known for its mineral rich water and is an ideal place for trout fishing.

Mattupetty
It is also one of the most beautiful places of picnic and sightseeing. Some of its attractions are the Mattupetty Lake, specialized dairy farm and Mattupetty Dam can entertain you for the days sightseeing. The Mattupetty Dam also facilitates boating you can try for it and extract as much happiness and delight from it. But remember to book for the Munnar hotels carefully with preplanning in advance because the hotels and resorts various with their facilities.
So make sure to book the right hotels in Munnar to add wonders in your tours like never before. You will find lots of hotels and resort with immense of possibilities and with benchmarked amenities, try to select the best one and make it the most memorable and unforgettable trip to the green paradise on earth.

Attukal
If you wish to go for a long trek and experiencing the exciting thrill of the panoramic view of the uninterrupted waterfalls amidst the undulating hills located in between Munnar and Pallivasal.
Apart from it there are the Nyayamakad which is one of the most beautiful outstanding trekking point and Eravikulam National Park which is known to be the gem of Munnar crown are some of the best places where you can relished mesmerizing moments that can never be erasable forever.

Find more information of Hotels in Munnar and Budget Hotels in Munnar at http://www.munnarhotels.org.in.

Munnar Hotels Offer the Superb Blend of Comforts and Luxurie

Kerala is wonderful state which is wedged between the gorgeous Arabian Sea and the green enormous Western Ghats. This beautiful state is truly visitor’s paradise and is the most sought after tourist destination in India. Situated on the southern tip of India truly this beautiful state is very worth to visit. Blessed by the beautiful nature and wide varieties of tourist attractions Kerala truly tops in India among the most traveled destination. This outstanding state is dotted with wide range of tourist attractions and beautiful destinations which easily attract visitors for their delightful vacation.

Kerala is truly very beautiful destinations which will leave the visitor spell bound on their visit. The picturesque beaches, scintillating backwaters, charming houseboat cruise, captivating lakes, cascading waterfalls, pleasant flora, green lush hill stations and exotic fauna truly will overcast magical spurt on the visitor on their visit to Kerala. This beautiful state is very popular for the green lush hill stations. But among the numerous hill towns in this state the most visited by the all the sort of vacationers is the beautiful Munnar.

The picturesque hill station Munnar is located at elevation of 1600 meter above the main sea level, offers the panoramic view of the three main mountain streams engulfing each other and other picturesque views which truly are breathtakingly beautiful. This beautiful hill station has wide range of tourist attractions both manmade and natural which truly enhance the beauty of Munnar. Lovingly this hill town is called as Kashmir of South which is visited by all the sorts of visitors. The standard hotels and the budget hotels in Munnar are speckled all over the hill town and this offers the visitors to choose hotels according to their taste and budget.

The excellent resorts and hotels in Munnar are very popular in the entire state of Kerala, which offer the visitor and the tourist delightful stay. The hotels in Munnar are beautifully situated along the green lush nature which offer the tourist very peace of mind, the tranquil surroundings and the pristine atmosphere elate the visitor’s heart and soul. The beautiful hotels and the resorts offer every convenience to the visitors as on their trip to Munnar. This hill town is visited by the honeymooners in intense number and truly the hotels here offer the couples the privacy at their best.

Munnar hotels apart from rending the incredible services to their visitors also offer sightseeing tour which truly is awesome and the attractions and the famous tourist places in Munnar included in this truly are out of these world. The attractions which are mostly added with the sightseeing tours are such as:

Devikulam: Devikulam is just situated 7 km away from Munnar and is truly the most beautiful and the charming place to visit and explore. The exotic flora and fauna, Sita Devi Lake, the cool mountain air and the velvet lawns easily lures every sort of visitors and these tempt them to visit again and again.

Attukal: Attukal is the ideal gateway for the vacationers in Munnar, this scenic place is located midway between the Munnar and Pallivasal which is very famous for the cascading waterfalls and green lush sprawling hills.

Beside these there are many scenic and beautiful places which are very worth to visit and explore in Munnar. The beauty of Munnar is incomparable with any other hill station in India.

Cochin Hotels and the Astounding Attractions to Explore In C

This state is very famous for the shimmering backwaters, picturesque beaches; houseboats cruise, green sprawling hill stations, exotic wildlife, colorful flora and the green lush paddy fields are some of the attractions which make Kerala more like a green paradise on earth.

Chinese Fishing Net

Munnar Hotels Redefining the Luxury and Hospitality

Munnar a picturesque hill town located in the Idduki district is gifted beautifully by the nature with wide and well organised tea gardens, mist kissed hills, exotic flora and fauna, relaxed atmosphere, classic and exotic hotels and resorts, sightseeing places and blissful ambiance. Munnar is truly a passionate nature’s lover paradise and so is the reason this picturesque hill station is visited by scores and scores of tourists, visitors, holiday makers, family vacationers and honeymooners from India and abroad.

Munnar is one among the many hill stations, which has astounding charm and beauty. The cool ambiance and the romantic atmosphere of Munnar have made it the top tourist places and with the increased visitors, the world class properties are also coming up.Munnar hotels also called Munnar properties in business terms are scattered all over mostly along the towns as well as in the picturesque locations that offer the panoramic view of the well organised tea gardens, mist kissed hills and the alluring view of the nature that are simply a wonder itself.

Hotels in Munnar are exotically beautiful and welcome the tourists and guest with the aroma of the tea gardens, refreshing cool air and luxury of premier quality. Munnar hotels or properties are well furnished with excellent services, modern appliances and world class hospitality as well as they have exotic rooms with wide windows from where the nature view can be enjoyed comfortably sitting in the rooms.

More of all there are five star hotels as well as budget hotels in Munnar,standard hotels and among all the most preferred are the fiver start hotels as they provide lavish luxury and comfort, internationally approved services, world class hospitality and all the luxury that are required to make the stay for the tourists, enjoyable, memorable and luxurious experiences of lifetime.

But if you are a budget traveller and looking for any budget hotels in Munnar, you have lots of options in your hand. Munnar has so many excellent budget hotels, where guest or the tourists can enjoy the luxury and comfort, excellent services as well as world class hospitality at the limited budget.

So if you are planning for a Munnar tour make sure that you book the hotel in an advance to avoid the last minute rush as well as to enjoy the excellent services on the basis of first come first serve.

Munnar- Breathtaking Landscape, Salubrious Climate

Munnar is like a glamorous dame who not only is good looking but also is of good character. Apart from its breathtaking landscape, Munnar holds a salubrious climate. Scores of tourists visit Munnar and it is a favorite spot for honeymooners.

Blessed with bounty of nature in excess, Munnar holds tremendous attraction among tourists. This mist shrouded hill station was discovered by British and turned into their summer resort. Munnar is a real retreat for tourists who are looking for something refreshing, soothing and gentle.

Munnar is situated in Kerala, a state in India. Kerala is renowned for its endowments galore from nature. Munnar is about one thousand and six hundred meters above sea level. This gorgeous paradise stands near the converging point of three rivers – Mattupetty, Nallathanni and Kundala.

Endowed with exotic flora and fauna, embellished with green carpet of manicured tea gardens, home to cascading waterfalls and gushing brooks, Munnar is ever ready to fascinate you. Catering to the millions of tourists who want to savor this magnificent hill station, many hotels and resorts have sprung up in Munnar. Munnar hotels offer high class accommodation facilities and its staff render endearing quality service round the clock. Hotels in Munnar is sure to enter in your good books.

The cuisine Munnar hotels offer is highly delicious and of almost all standard varieties from continental to Chinese and Thai. The warmth and hospitality one gets from hotels in Munnar makes the stay truly unforgettable. The visitor’s books of hotels are full of fond compliments guests have entered about the endearing experience.
Munnar Hotels apart from spacious and luxurious rooms with modern décor gives hot and cold water running round the clock, Banquet hall, conference hall, meeting hall, amenities for indoor and outdoor games, Doctors on call, twenty four hours security, spacious parking facilities and travel desk services. Some hotels in Munnar have Ayurveda spas and Yoga centers which in convergence with the salubrious climate have good effect on visitors.

Most hotels offer facilities for business purposes like conferences, meetings and training programmes etc. The cool ambience and inspiring climate will bring out loads of creativity sleeping inside the participants. Conducting conferences, meetings and training in Munnar will be an enriching affair.
Marked by vast expanses of tea plantations, colonial bungalows, rivulets, waterfalls and cool weather, Munnar is an ideal destination for trekking and mountain biking. Some places of notable worth nearby to Munnar are Eravikulam National park, Anamudi Peak, Mattupetty, Pallivasal, Chinnakanal, Anayirangal, Rajamalai, Echo Point, Top station, Tea Museum etc.

Eravikulam National Park located twelve kilometer from Munnar holds the largest sustainable number of Nilgiri Tahr, an endangered species. The park is also haven of several species of rare butterflies, animals and birds.Anamudi Peak is about thirteen kilometers away from Munnar. It is the highest mountain of Kerala and treks are allowed with permission from authorities. Mattupetty also of the same distance from Munnar and situated one thousand and seven hundred meters above sea level, it is home to a storage stone dam and lake, in which one can take a boat ride enjoying the hillside and valley surrounding. Mattupetty is also famous for the Indo- Swiss dairy farm with a swarm of variety high yielding breeds of cows.

Bolghatty Palace
Bolghatty Palace is the oldest Dutch Palaces outside Holland. This quaint mansion was built in 1774 by the Dutch traders. Latter on green emerald gardens were landscaped around it which enhance the beauty of this astounding Palace. This amazing palace remained as Governors palace and latter on was leased to British government.

Cherai Beach
This is one of the most astounding beaches in the entire state of Kerala. This picturesque beach borders the executive Vypeen Island which also boasts the beauty of this stunning beach. St. Francis Church
This is the most beautiful and wonderful elegant church and is the oldest in the city. This church in Cochin has a great significance history, which is also the oldest European church in India. It is this church where Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama dead body was buried when in 1524 he died in Cochin. Apart from these the marvel architecture easily attracts visitors on their vacation.

Munnar Splendor at Your Doorstep

Three Deccan Rivers that flow through Munnar namely Madupetti, Nallathanni and Periavaru which join some distance away from the world famed Hill station of the Paradise of the south India unravel the mystery behind the beautiful etymology of Munnar. Munnar located in the Western Ghats is part of the god’s own country which has been on the top 50 places of lifetime.

Munnar being a top favorite among the tea plantation and countryside lovers who flock in to God’s own country to visit one of most beautiful hill station of the south India located in its very own paradise Kerala has loads of jaw droopingly astonishing resorts and hotels located in Munnar itself.

Munnar used to be the summer resort of the British during the times of colonial India and has now emerged as one of the most visited hill stations of the Asian subcontinent. Tourists swarm in at all times of the year just to get a glimpse of the astoundingly beautiful tea plantations. The majority of the tea estates are owned by Tata Tea. In fact, the entire area is known as the Kannan Devan Hills, from which the famous brand of the Tata's gets its name.

Sprawling tea gardens, dense hills for trekking, scenic landscape for sightseeing only adds to the alluring features of this little but salubrious hill station.

Hotels have played an integral role in the development of Munnar tourism. In the past few decades, Munnar has emerged as one of most visited destinations due to the serene plains, windy palms, sparkling blue sky, pearl Blue Mountains,lush green surroundings.

Tourism is one major part of the economy of Munnar apart from the vast tea plantations and has lead to glorious development in the area.

Munnar is a well connected through roadways with Kochi, Coimbatore, Kodaikanal, Aluva. Cochin International Airport connects it airways with other Airports, then Munnar can be reached by roadway connected with the Airport.

Relish the Superb Hotels of Munnar and Its Cozy Stay

Munnar is a beautiful hill station of Kerala and is considered to be the best hill destinations of India. It is a small town with vast tea plantation cultivated by the local people for trade and is the main tea producing center in the state. This beautiful hill resort is situated in Idukki district of the Western Ghats con the confluence of the three mountain stream fully decorated by the greenery. It is an idyllic site for holiday spending and honeymoon stay amidst the pleasant atmosphere of love and romance created by nature of cool and tranquility surrounding the hill.

Echo point
It is a well visited tourist spot loved by most of the tourist coming from different parts of the world. It is the highest point in Munnar which is situated only about 15 m from it. There are many coz and comfortable inns and accommodations are offered in it. Its hotels are among the top luxurious Munnar hotels available at the affordable cheap price. The amazing beautiful places like Kanimbla valley and king Tableland which famous for its panoramic scenery and awesome rocky formations are clearly view from this site. There are also popular resorts and hotels located in the famous Katoomba city listed among the world heritage National Parks which is considered to be the second most beautiful place located in Australia.

Eravikulam National Park
It is also one of the sought after popular attractions of Kerala which is commonly known as the Rajamalai National Park. Most of the endangered species of animals and plants are preserved in this place. Some of the species like the mountain goats, rolling grasslands and shoals are some of the endangered species found in this famous National Park. Many of the tourists love to watch goats and so they climb the high peak just to have the glimpse of the herb of goat grazing in the green field.

Anamudi Peak
It is the highest peak in the south of the Himalayas which lies in the interior of the Eravikulam National Park and a famous site for trekking. Here in the slope of the hills there many mysteries unique flora and fauna are found. The Atlas moth which is the largest of its kind in the world is one of the unique inhabitants of the park. Some of the famous species other than Atlas moth are the Nilgiri Langur, the lion-tailed macaque, leopards and tigers are some of the rare type of species found in it. If you are in search of all day adventure enjoyment and accompanying being its wildlife nature then make sure to book some of the special Hotels in Munnar found this striking adventure site which provides the facility to fulfill your desire and satisfaction.

It is because honeymoon and holiday is the time to stay away from the chaos and noise of the city life and enjoy the peaceful relaxation in the picturesque nature. Lovingly called the Queen of the Arabian Sea, Cochin or Kochi is one of the important cities in Kerala. Cochin is not only famous for its outstanding tourism attractions and sightseeing spots. It has scores of tourist’s places that are ideal for tours and travels. Some of the wonderful places which will engross you and offer you incredible memories to relish in for lifelong are listed as below:

Chinese Fishing Net

Set up between 1350 to 1450, Chinese Fishing Net in Cochin Harbour attracts thousands of tourists round the year. Chinese fishing net is locally called Cheenavala and the nets are set up on bamboo, suspended in the mid air along with the coast. The Chinese Fishing net is one of the popular tourist attractions and is incredibly beautiful that allures great number of visitors round the year.

Bolgatty Palace

Bolgatty Island is one of the most sought after destination. Located beside the picturesque Ernakulam island and Eillingdon Island, the place is a favourite hangout of the tourists. It is the ideal destination to hang out and to provide excellent facilities with immense pleasure and joy.

Maritime Museum Kochi

It is one of the most aspiring and the most astonishing place in Kerala. It is museum is dedicated to the naval forces of India and earns reputation around for the world for their relentless services, dedication, valor and the selfless services towards the country.

Dutch Palace

Dutch Palace also called Mattancherry Palace is also one of the important tourist attractions in Cochin. It is located 10 kms away from Ernakulam City and the Palace was constructed by the Portuguese and presented to the then Raja of Kochi. This traditional style of architecture is one of the prominent attractions in Kochi and is also called “nalukettus”.
